parameters.name: Monitors
parameters.description: Amazon CloudWatch alarms to monitor during the deployment process. (dict) --- Amazon CloudWatch alarms to monitor during the deployment process. Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon CloudWatch alarm. AlarmRoleArn (string) --- ARN of an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role for AppConfig to monitor AlarmArn.

nested_params.name: AlarmArn
nested_params.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon CloudWatch alarm.

nested_params.name: AlarmRoleArn
nested_params.description: ARN of an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role for AppConfig to monitor AlarmArn.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the environment. An environment can be in one of the following states: READY_FOR_DEPLOYMENT, DEPLOYING, ROLLING_BACK, or ROLLED_BACK.

nested_items.name: Monitors
nested_items.description: Amazon CloudWatch alarms monitored during the deployment.

nested_items.name: AlarmArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: AlarmRoleArn
nested_items.description: ARN of an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role for AppConfig to monitor AlarmArn.
